name: Autumn - 24 Game
description:
You can choose to play a single or network game. In fact, this game can not only use 24 as the target total but also any even number from 24 to 40. All calculations have a record. The record includes questions (four numbers), the correct answer, the time it takes to answer, and the result (correct/wrong). Players can review their history. 

There are two types of online competition: 

1. Rank competition for the success rate, average speed, and the total number of correct answers of the online players.

The game also provides lists of the top 10 registered online players in terms of the success rate, the average speed, and the total correct answers number.

2. Two people play against each other (10 rooms in maximum)

Whoever answers the correct answer first gets one point, and the other player loses one point. If both fail to answer within the agreed time limit, the computer will terminate the battle and start a new one. A list of the top 10 double competition players can be displayed.
